body:
Comment 1 by **Cryptooctoploid**: 
I've the same problem here on Arch Linux.
kernel 2.6.32-rc6 (64-bit)
gcc version 4.4.2
GNU C Library stable release version 2.11

Here are some more details:
(goo is wrapper :
#!/bin/bash
6g -o $1.6 $1 && 6l $1.6 && ./6.out $2 $3 $4
)

 % goo cmp2.go
comparing uncomparable type []int
throw: interface compare

panic PC=0x7f9f05134ed8
throw+0x3e /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:74
        throw(0x408ad8, 0x0)
ifaceeq1+0x85 /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/iface.c:481
        ifaceeq1(0x5126790, 0x7f9f, 0x5126790, 0x7f9f, 0x40b278, ...)
efaceeq+0x55 /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/iface.c:506
        efaceeq(0x40b278, 0x0, 0x5126790, 0x7f9f, 0x40b278, ...)
runtime·efaceeq+0x3a /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/iface.c:521
        runtime·efaceeq(0x40b278, 0x0, 0x5126790, 0x7f9f, 0x40b278, ...)
main·main+0x63 /home/markus/go/test/cmp2.go:15
        main·main()
mainstart+0xf /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/amd64/asm.s:55
        mainstart()
goexit /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:135
        goexit()

 % goo const1.go
const1.go:27: constant 10100 overflows int8
const1.go:29: constant 1000 overflows int8
const1.go:29: constant 101000 overflows int8
const1.go:30: constant 1000 overflows int8
const1.go:30: constant 101000 overflows int8
const1.go:31: constant 1000 overflows int8
const1.go:31: constant 101000 overflows int8
const1.go:32: constant 1000 overflows int8
const1.go:32: constant 101000 overflows int8
const1.go:33: constant 202 overflows int8
const1.go:33: fatal error: too many errors

 % goo cmp3.go
comparing uncomparable type []int
throw: interface compare

panic PC=0x7ff816d61ed8
throw+0x3e /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:74
        throw(0x408ad8, 0x0)
ifaceeq1+0x85 /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/iface.c:481
        ifaceeq1(0x16d53790, 0x7ff8, 0x16d53790, 0x7ff8, 0x40b278, ...)
efaceeq+0x55 /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/iface.c:506
        efaceeq(0x40b278, 0x0, 0x16d53790, 0x7ff8, 0x40b278, ...)
runtime·efaceeq+0x3a /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/iface.c:521
        runtime·efaceeq(0x40b278, 0x0, 0x16d53790, 0x7ff8, 0x40b278, ...)
main·main+0x63 /home/markus/go/test/cmp3.go:15
        main·main()
mainstart+0xf /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/amd64/asm.s:55
        mainstart()
goexit /home/markus/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:135
        goexit()

% goo func4.go
func4.go:12: cannot take the address of main
func4.go:12: x declared and not used
func4.go:13: cannot assign to main


 % goo interface/explicit.go
interface/explicit.go:25: need type assertion to use E as *T
interface/explicit.go:30: *T is not I
        missing M()
interface/explicit.go:31: *T is not I
        missing M()
interface/explicit.go:34: need type assertion to use I as I2
        missing N()
interface/explicit.go:37: need type assertion to use I as I2
        missing N()
interface/explicit.go:40: cannot use T(e) (type T) as type *T
interface/explicit.go:40: need type assertion to use E as T

 % goo interface/pointer.go
interface/pointer.go:34: x declared and not used
interface/pointer.go:34: *Inst is not Inst
        missing Next() (*Inst)

 % goo interface/receiver1.go
interface/receiver1.go:29: T is not P
        missing P()
interface/receiver1.go:36: S is not P
        missing P()
Attachments: 1. goo (57 bytes)
